about_the_game:
The original soundtrack of Little Busters! ~Refrain~, the second season of the anime, is now available on Steam!
With 17 tracks featured in the Refrain anime, this album is a must have for fans of the Little Busters! anime adaptation.
Download the Little Busters! ~Refrain~ Original Soundtrack now to relive your Little Busters! moments both at home and on to go!

* This soundtrack DLC is a digital version of the original 2013 soundtrack album Little Busters! ~Refrain~ Original Soundtrack (KLSA-0094) and features 17 tracks.

Little Busters! ~Refrain~ Original Soundtrack Track list

1. Boys be Smile (TV Size)

2. Calm days
3. Day-to-day
4. Just From You Being There.
5. Afternoon Roadside Trees
6. The other side of chaos
7. Days of tears and lilies
8. recollect
9. Crisis
10. Noisy
11. Guidepost to Tomorrow
12. Kimi to Nakushimono (TV Size)
13. Little Busters! EX (TV Size)
14. Mezameta Asa ni wa Kimi ga Tonari ni (TV Size)
15. Heroic Battle Remix
16. Little Busters! ~TV animation ver.~ (TV Size)
17. Alicemagic ~TV animation ver.~ (TV Size)
